column1: What was the name of ancient indian town?
column2: Sita was found in a field; she was a daughter of the Earth, and was born without parents.

column1: What was the name of the poet?
column2: One day as this sage, Valmiki, was going to bathe in the holy river Ganga, he saw a pair of doves wheeling round and round, and kissing each other.
